attributes.action: Print Wat Tyler on the £50.00 Note
attributes.background: With the printing of new figures on updated UK currency, we believe that Wat Tyler should be printed on any new £50.00 notes for his legacy as an English Military leader and supporter of the working people.

rejection.details:
Bank notes are the responsibility of the Bank of England, which is independent of the Government and Parliament.

You can find out how the Bank decides who will be on bank notes here: 
http://www.bankofengland.co.uk/banknotes/Pages/characters/selection.aspx
